example.code:
PS C:\ New-IAMPolicy -PolicyName MySamplePolicy -PolicyDocument (Get-Content -Raw MySamplePolicy.json)
Arn : arn:aws:iam::123456789012:policy/MySamplePolicy AttachmentCount : 0 CreateDate : 4/14/2015 2:45:59 PM DefaultVersionId : v1 Description : IsAttachable : True Path : / PolicyId : LD4KP6HVFE7WGEXAMPLE1 PolicyName : MySamplePolicy UpdateDate : 4/14/2015 2:45:59 PM
example.description: This example creates a new IAM policy in the current AWS account named MySamplePolicy The file MySamplePolicy.json provides the policy content. Note that you must use the -Raw switch parameter to successfully process the JSON policy file.
